name: Double You
description:
'''Double You''' were an Italian [[Techno]] and [[Eurodance]] group founded in 1985 by vocalist William Naraine, keyboardist and producer Franco Amato and DJ Andrea de Antoni. By 1992, they had sold more than three million records. "[[Please Don't Go (KC and the Sunshine Band song)#Double You version|Please Don't Go]]", a dance version of [[KC & the Sunshine Band]]'s 1979 ballad, is one of their major hits.

Since 2013, they have been fronted by Naraine, Gino Martini, Gustavo Filipovich, Paulo Soveral and Missaka.
